Room.Name: Amberton Lane/Monument Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Amberton Lane and Monument Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane was not so lucky when the mages of Keslar decided that this would be a good place to put a mountain, and subsequently destroyed a portion of Amberton Lane. In order to continue on Amberton Lane, you must go east on Monument and then head north on Levaithan. You may then take any western-heading road back to Amberton.
